hadiths.text: Yahya b Abi Kathir has reported this hadith with the same chain of transmitters and narrated:And there he was sitting on the Throne between the heaven and the earth

chapter.ara-name: باب بَدْءِ الْوَحْىِ إِلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The beginning of the revelation to the messenger of Allah (ﷺ)
